welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Philipsburg, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Princess Juliana International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Princess Juliana International Airport, primarily serving regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Esperance Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Esperance Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a connection limit of 2 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wallblake Airport serves all incoming and outgoing flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Gustaf III (St-Jean) Airport, serving all commercial flights to and from Saint Barthélemy.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at J. Yrausquin Airport serves as the hub for all incoming and outgoing flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
